title: A New Recipe from Our Upcoming Book

blogimage.name: new-recipe-upcoming-book
blogimage.alt: A New Recipe from Our Upcoming Book

long_description:
Whole Wheat Banana Nut Bread by Marge

Ingredients:

  • ½ cup butter
  • 1 cup all-purpose flour
  • 1 cup whole wheat flour
  • 2 eggs, slightly beaten
  • 3 ripe bananas, mashed
  • ½ tsp salt
  • 1 tsp baking soda
  • 1 cup sugar
  • ½ cup walnuts, chopped
  • 1/3 cup hot water

Directions:

Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Melt butter and blend with sugar. Mix in beaten eggs and mashed banana until smooth. Sift all-purpose flour along with salt and baking soda. Stir in whole wheat flour. Add remaining dry ingredients alternately with hot water until all are just incorporated.

Gently add banana/egg mixture, then chopped nuts lightly. Don’t over mix. Pour into greased 9”X5” loaf pan and bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour 10 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean in the center. Remove from pan as soon as cool enough to work with.

Photo Courtesy: bhofack2/Thinkstock/iStock
